DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to assess the safety and effect of Viusid (bags of 4 grams) administration in the treatment of acute fever of viral etiology as diagnosed by clinical, hematologic and serologic parameters. The duration of this open and randomized phase 2 clinical trial will be 6 days. The estimated number of persons with acute fever of viral etiology to be recruited and randomized for the study is 200. The primary outcome measure: platelet, leukocyte and granulocyte count will be assessed at the beginning and the end of the study.
DOC.brief_title: Viusid in Adults With Acute Fever of Viral Etiology
DOC.criteria: Acute fever of viral etiology with less than 72 hours of progression Signed informed consent. Patients under treatment with other antioxidants. Inability to swallow the content of Viusid bags
